email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan as 15-18 October to avoid any delays. Can you confirm the vessel’s availability for this window? Also, please send over the full charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and the laycan of 15-18 October is acceptable. I’ll send over the charter party shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. We’ve reviewed the charter party, and everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $51.25 and the laycan of 15-18 October. Please confirm the final details, and we’ll issue the fixture note. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed! Freight rate is $51.25 per metric ton, laycan 15-18 October, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. I’ll prepare the fixture note and send it over for your signature. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
